title: champion misterioso
body: oggi dovevano consegnare il fatidico "CAMPIONE MISTERIOSO". A me non è ancora arrivato... ho collegato  facebook a LOL e non mi è arrivato nulla. AIUTATEMI!!!!!!{{champion:32}}

replies.body:

The champ'll come out, tomorrow.Bet your bottom dollar that tomorrow, there'll be the champ. Just thinking about, tomorrow, clears away the cobwebs and the sorrows, till thers none.When im stuck with a day thats gray, and lonely, I just stick out my chin and grin and say______oh!_____.the champ'll come out , tomorrow, sp you gotta hang on till,tomorrow, Come what may!______Tomorow, tomorrow,I love yah, tomorrow,you're always a day away. ---------------------------INSTRUMEL BREAK------------------------------ When im stuck with a day, thats gray, and lonely, I just stick out my chin and grin and say!_____ Oh!_______The champ'll, come out, tomorrow, so you gotta hang on till tomorrow, come what may!___ Tomorrow, tomorrow, Ilove yah, tomorrow you're always a day away. Toooomorrow , tomorrow, I loveyah, tomorrow, , you're always a-day-a-way!!!
